platen-art-local.title: Art (from local media)
platen-art-local.description: Add art as a figure with an optional content warning.

fields.name: caption
fields.title: Caption: Specify Markdown for the figure's caption. Implies `as_figure` is true.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the figure in a space-separated list. Each class must have a period (`.`) prefix.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID: Specify an ID to add to the figure so it's directly linkable. The ID must have a hash (`#`) prefix.

fields.name: style
fields.title: Preset Style: Specify the dotpath to a defined style for this artwork to use.
